alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 10:40PM CDT until March 25 at 6:01PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Oliver Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo, Hale and Tuscaloosa Counties. .Heavy rainfall over the last 24 hours over the Black Warrior River basin is causing rising and a flood warning is now in effect for the Black Warrior River near Oliver Lock and Dam. Another statement will be issued by Wednesday afternoon, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Oliver Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening to Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 125.0 feet, Flooding of some roads leading into homes in the Hemphill Bend area southwest of Tuscaloosa occurs. At 129.0 feet, Flooding of agricultural lands in areas southwest of Tuscaloosa occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 111.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above action stage Wednesday afternoon. It will continue to rise and go above flood stage late Wednesday evening to a crest of 131.2 feet early Thursday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Friday morning, but remain above action stage until Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 129.0 feet. Action stage is 122.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
